snippet: Even though the Consumer Electronics Show is the world’s biggest technology convention, companies are seeking ways to introduce their products on their own.
abstract: Consumer Electronics Show is the world’s biggest technology convention but companies are seeking ways to introduce their products on their own at smaller events; show is once again unlikely to be where any blockbuster products of 2012 are introduced; trend reflects changing nature of the technology industry.
lead_paragraph: Even though the Consumer Electronics Show is the world’s biggest technology convention, companies are seeking ways to introduce their products on their own.

headline.seo: Tech Show Loses Clout as the Place for Product News
headline.main: A Tech Show Loses Clout as Industry Shifts
headline.print_headline: Tech Show Loses Clout As the Place For Big News
